mapper.select: select payment_id as paymentId , card_name as cardName , right(card_no,4) as cardLastNo , expiration_month as expirationMonth , expiration_year as expirationYear , is_default as isDefaultPayment from payment where account_no = #{accountNo}

select top 1 payment_id as paymentId , card_name as cardName , right(card_no,4) as cardLastNo , expiration_month as expirationMonth , expiration_year as expirationYear , is_default as isDefaultPayment from payment where account_no = #{accountNo} and is_default = 1

select payment_id as paymentId , card_no as cardNo , card_name as cardName , expiration_month as expirationMonth , expiration_year as expirationYear , card_verification_code as cardVerificationCode from payment where account_no = #{accountNo} and payment_id = #{paymentId}
